alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence, northwestern Marion and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1029 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms near Effingham, or near Greeleyville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Dangerous lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Kingstree, Timmonsville, Pamplico, Blue Brick, Mars Bluff, Cades, Hebron, New Hope, Salters, Sardis, Hyman, Hannah, Effingham, Francis Marion University, Friendfield, Claussen, Evergreen and Scranton. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 149 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
